headline: Shorter DISH Lease Durations Lead to “Cleanest” 2026 Outlook for SBA Communications (SBAC)
summary: SBA Communications Corporation (NASDAQ:SBAC) is one of the most favored real estate investment trusts according to Hedge Funds. On December 10, UBS analyst Batya Levi reaffirmed his Buy rating on SBA Communications Corporation (NASDAQ:SBAC) and raised his price target to $275. This estimate yields an impressive upside potential of almost 42%. Levi maintained his stance […]
